title: Client won't let me gift.
body: Trying to gift an alt but cannot. Rito pls.

replies.body: Some hours later and I was able to gift. Not sure what the issue was. I could steam fine, but it's whatever.

I've double checked and you meet all the requirements to be able to gift your alt, so there must be something blocking that gift. This might be happening from some kind of weird unstable connection, which is making the client unable to complete the gift. 

Make sure to go through all the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to check for any odd network settings, but let me know if that doesn't work and we'll get this figured out!
